option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: # Activate the conda environment Write-Host "Activating mamba env" conda activate tectonic # Run Tectonic to build the document Write-Host "Building document" Z:\Code\tectonic\target\release\tectonic.exe -X build --keep-intermediates # Open the generated PDF with SumatraPDF Write-Host "Viewing document" Start-Process '$env:localappdata\SumatraPDF\sumatrapdf.exe' -reuse-instance "build\default\default.pdf"
